title: [CLIENT] Attention Splash Team: Pentakill Yorick splash needs to be inverted
body: For almost every group splash art, the picture is always mirrored in such a way so that the champion you're looking at is not obstructed by the sidebar to the left. However, Pentakill Yorick seems to be the rare case in which he's obstructed by the sidebar. I wanted to look at the larger picture of his skin but was unable to do so. I don't even own Yorick, but this seems like something the splash team can hopefully remedy for those interested in looking at his skin :)

replies.body:
Hey lildyo! 

Thanks for the report! This is something on our radar to resolve. ^-^
Thanks KateyKhaos! I'm sure Yorick players will rejoice :)

Expect it to get fixed around the time of Yorick's rework (probably late this year to early next).  Yorick's has never been a priority for any promotion, advancement or work for Riot and that won't change until the rework... and possibly after the rework.
Noooo, don't fix it, it's hilarious and fitting!
